Summary: Bright silvery-bronze oval shaped craft (not a disc).
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Plymouth
There were no other sightings in Plymouth on or around September 20th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were driving south to Cape Cod. My friend was directly behind me on Rt. 3 just outside of Plymouth MA. The sky was gorgeous and clear. I noticed the craft (as described above)at the 1 o'clock position and watched it for a few minutes as it was stationary. I knew it was not a plane from previous experience. I then called my friend on my cell phone to ask if she could see it and agreed it was really there. I continued driving and it blinked out but then showed up again at the 11 o'clock position and only for about a minute and then was gone. My friend witnessed this also and it was her first sighting. I was on vacation and away from computers or I would have written sooner. I spent 52 years in my homestate of Colorado with my last residence in the San Luis Valley. I did witness 3 seperate craft events and had different people with me to validate those sightings. I also found a mutilated cow outside of Hooper in 1996-'97(?) and reported it to Chris O'Brien. One of my photos is on his site. I was very excited to witness this craft here in MA. All previous 3 sightings were disc shaped and this one was different.
